title: That moment when you win 10 ranked games in a row
body: and really dont want to play another because you know youre past due for a troll game

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=KennyLay,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bErAE6UY,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-09-25T13:09:33.710+0000)
>
> and really dont want to play another because you know youre past due for **10 troll games in a row**

fixed

to be fair, only some of them are troll games. half of them are 4v5's and then a couple where every other lane just gets destroyed.

what are you talking about theres no forced 50 no way

¬_¬

Well,it's pretty obvious what happened.
1st the stars were in the proper alignment.
After that,you sacrificed at least 10 Teemos to the Rito Gods.
Then you found 5 Four-Leaf clovers on the way home from work.
Afterwards,you traveled to the Temple of Fortune & performed the sacred Lucky Dance.
And finally,you defeated the Raid Boss of Miss Fortune to acquire the temporary buff called "You Lucky Mother Fucker".Well,I think that's how it's translated.
this is not a possibility for me, my luck wouldnt let it happen not even 3 wins in a row
Rip Promos
But you can still do VDVDV and win promos ;)

hes oppressive as all hell and i honestly believe him to be one of the best jungle skirmish supports

dang man. I know a good supp can turn the tides of a match an' all, but I just can't stand playing supp. It just feels so unrewarding/unsatisfying. Not to mention you are constantly dependent on your team actually being competent enough to secure the kills you set up.

I'm just not strong enough to put my faith in 4 random ppl to give me a win like that. (tho I guess the same could be said when I go top lane. :/ can farm up top all day, and have bot and mid feed hard)

i honestly only had one close game in the 13 wins
That moment when you lose 10 ranked games in a row. and really want to keep playing because you know youre past due for a good game, but you keep losing.

> [{quoted}](name=Mayor Stubbs,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bErAE6UY,comment-id=0015,timestamp=2015-09-26T01:00:51.264+0000)

I know those feels, man
Pretty much this

dont worry your next 6-10 games would be lost and you will get the worst team!!

Riot algorithm!!

We already know what is going on.....win streaks and then massive lose streaks or the opposite...
When you win an Insane amount of games in a row your, MMR, spikes quite a bit. Making it more difficult and difficult and difficult. Resulting in loss streaks.

im just not seeing it yet though i know it should be coming soon
im at 13 wins in a row and already vsing all golds(im silver 5)

> [{quoted}](name=KennyLay,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bErAE6UY,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-26T01:02:12.335+0000)

If you stopped duo'ing with that Gold III player, I imagine your opponents would be lower elo...
problem is when this happens and your a good player you will still do good but your team will just be shit
if you're still way above your real elo you will keep winning. If you got a lucky streak and are out of your league then you will come crashing back down to earth, working as intended.

> [{quoted}](name=Bard in a Diaper,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bErAE6UY,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-09-25T16:28:04.143+0000)
>
> if you're still way above your real elo you will keep winning. If you got a lucky streak and are out of your league then you will come crashing back down to earth, working as intended.

well i just won my 11th and everyone in game was low gold.  Im silver 5
Oh man, you are in for a LOOOOOONNNNGGG trolling streak.
10 ranked games in a row? Sempai pls, teach me your ways Q_Q
Gambler's fallacy I say!
you flip a quarter 10 times in a row, what's the chance they all come up heads?
We're not asking the probability of the 10 heads only that the 11th will be tails which is completely independent.

> [{quoted}](name=RisenDarkKnight,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bErAE6UY,comment-id=000800000000,timestamp=2015-09-25T21:09:02.457+0000)
that the 11th will be tails which is completely independent **_in a completely random environment_**.

In reality, there are too many random factors to say that the chance for the 11th will be tails  is completely independent. That why "Gambler's Fallacy" exist in the real world, but not in an entirely random environment.

Yeah good point. I guess I didn't consider that confidence you'd get for winning 10 in row while the other players might be tilting, and the small increase in mmr from winning.  It's not completely random at this stage.
Yessir!

If you win 10 ranked games in a row, doesn't that increase your mmr and change the probability of getting paired against more difficult opponents? 

In other words, how does the gambler's fallacy apply in an elo rating system?

Yes it increases your mmr which typically means tougher opponents. However, unless there are more trolls at the mmr you have risen to, it does not increase the chance of getting a troll on your team. If we were looking at only win loss ratio then maybe you would have an increased chance of losing.
nice job on ten wins
never gotten more than 5 wins in a row before it all goes wrong

When I started playing ranked again I was S5, and then I won 27/30 games.
Went to S1 in 4 days. It was great.
yeah got today win and then got to my plat 5 promo,SURPRISE BUTTSECKS 5 losses in a row and lost promo,got to 56 lp from 100 and had an afk without loss prevented.
This game isn't even worth playing on weekends. I dunno why I bother.

Happened to me a few weeks ago, exactly 10 wins in a row, in my promotion series games, The ADC decides to troll because his Support was not keeping him alive in team fights, In the other game it was a 4v5...
My cousin and I have duo-queued 7 wins in a row with Ashe/Zilean bottom lane. The slow, clock stun, arrow stun is incredibly deadly.
i got 10+ win streak once, and then 10+ streak of afkers and trolls right after..
that gameplay and balance tho

Not playing ranked but whenever i'm on an ARAM win-streak i get the worst people afterwards that are toxic, afk, build super troll or feed 24 7 for the next couple of games so that the system evens out. There is no way in elo-hell that this is happening without intention ;)
wow, 10?  I didn't think it was possible.

>

managed 13 before losing 2 promo matches in a row

if you win like 10 or 7 games in a row the chance of winning the next is like 8% , thats just how riot wants it to go i always get matched with good people and win then i keep losing till i get demoted, the concept is just stupid

yes. YES.
Then you lose the next 10 in a row... Yikes :(
